con:config.script:
import com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder import jxl.* import jxl.write.* import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def TestCase = context.testCase FilePath = "C:\\Users\\VandanaKapoor\\TestData.xls" Workbook WorkBook1 = Workbook.getWorkbook(new File(FilePath)) Sheet Sheet1 = WorkBook1.getSheet(0)
PropertiesTestStep = TestCase.getTestStepByName("AddingProperty") PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("firstName", Sheet1.getCell(0,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("lastName", Sheet1.getCell(1,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("email", Sheet1.getCell(2,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("city", Sheet1.getCell(6,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("paymentmethod", Sheet1.getCell(14,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("bankName", Sheet1.getCell(11,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("accountnumber", Sheet1.getCell(13,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("password", Sheet1.getCell(3,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("telephone", Sheet1.getCell(4,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("company", Sheet1.getCell(5,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("address1", Sheet1.getCell(7,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("address2", Sheet1.getCell(9,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("trackingNumber", Sheet1.getCell(10,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("countrycode", Sheet1.getCell(8,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("bankAccountName", Sheet1.getCell(12,1).getContents())

con:configuration.scriptText: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def responseMessage = messageExchange.response.responseContent def GetResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseMessage) assert( GetResponse.data.customer_id.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#CustomerId}') assert( GetResponse.data.addresses[0].customer_id.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#CustomerId}') assert( GetResponse.data.affiliate.customer_id.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#CustomerId}') assert( GetResponse.data.firstname.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#firstName}') assert( GetResponse.data.addresses[0].lastname.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#lastName}') assert( GetResponse.data.firstname.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#firstName}') assert( GetResponse.data.addresses[0].lastname.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#lastName}') assert( GetResponse.data.email.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#email}') assert( GetResponse.data.affiliate.tracking.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#trackingNumber}') assert( GetResponse.data.addresses[0].city.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#city}') assert( GetResponse.data.addresses[0].address_2.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#address2}') assert( GetResponse.data.affiliate.payment.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#paymentmethod}') assert( GetResponse.data.affiliate.bank_account_number.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#accountnumber}')

con:config.script:
import com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder import jxl.* import jxl.write.* import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def TestCase = context.testCase FilePath = "C:\\Users\\VandanaKapoor\\TestData.xls" Workbook WorkBook1 = Workbook.getWorkbook(new File(FilePath)) Sheet Sheet1 = WorkBook1.getSheet(0)
PropertiesTestStep = TestCase.getTestStepByName("AddingProperty") PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("firstName", Sheet1.getCell(0,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("lastName", Sheet1.getCell(1,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("email", Sheet1.getCell(2,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("city", Sheet1.getCell(6,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("paymentmethod", Sheet1.getCell(14,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("bankName", Sheet1.getCell(11,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("accountnumber", Sheet1.getCell(13,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("password", Sheet1.getCell(3,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("telephone", Sheet1.getCell(4,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("company", Sheet1.getCell(5,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("address1", Sheet1.getCell(7,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("address2", Sheet1.getCell(9,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("trackingNumber", Sheet1.getCell(10,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("countrycode", Sheet1.getCell(8,1).getContents()) PropertiesTestStep.setPropertyValue("bankAccountName", Sheet1.getCell(12,1).getContents())

con:configuration.scriptText: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def responseMessage = messageExchange.response.responseContent def GetResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseMessage) assert( GetResponse.data.customer_id.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#CustomerId}') assert( GetResponse.data.addresses[0].customer_id.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#CustomerId}') assert( GetResponse.data.affiliate.customer_id.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#CustomerId}') assert( GetResponse.data.firstname.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#firstName}') assert( GetResponse.data.addresses[0].lastname.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#lastName}') assert( GetResponse.data.firstname.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#firstName}') assert( GetResponse.data.addresses[0].lastname.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#lastName}') assert( GetResponse.data.email.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#email}') assert( GetResponse.data.affiliate.tracking.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#trackingNumber}') assert( GetResponse.data.addresses[0].city.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#city}') assert( GetResponse.data.addresses[0].address_2.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#address2}') assert( GetResponse.data.affiliate.payment.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#paymentmethod}') assert( GetResponse.data.affiliate.bank_account_number.toString())==context.expand('${AddingProperty#accountnumber}')
